data.text:
@diamondrvp1 @TheRealPro7 End of 0andemic without the end of lockdowns? How does this work?

Is it the blind leading the blind?

@TheRealPro7 @Riddlemethat14 Andrea Bocelli very graciously performed and it was streamed to millions of people around the world to instill hope during the early days of the pandemic. It was a beautiful event. I watched it live and have gone back a few times to watch it again. Yes he is completely blind.
@TheRealPro7 @Riddlemethat14 we were told to dance Jerusalema challenge in the middle of the “deadliest “ pandemic. I’m still traumatised 🤒
@Gugu_lethuz @Riddlemethat14 How is he different from Zelenksy,they are both artists...
